CustomField.formula: IF( DoNotCall==true, HYPERLINK("callto://+" & MobilePhone, Phone) & " " &IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file= 0151w0000006UNI","" ,15,15), HYPERLINK("callto://+" & MobilePhone, Phone) & " " &IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file= 0151w0000006UNN","" ,15,15))
CustomField.label: Phone Call Options
